title: Multivar Linear Sys&Ctrl
description: Techniques for analysis and description of multivariable linear systems. Tools for advanced feedback control design for these systems, including computational packages. Credit will not be awarded for both AE 6530 and ECE 6550 or AE 6530 and ME 6401.

prerequisites: AE 3531 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
